mobs.LongDesc: A large muscular blacksmith stands here ready to sell you a weapon
mobs.DetailedDesc:
A large man dressed entirely in black.  You notice his massive arms as he
works over the fire making a sword.  The blacksmith is not a person to be
messed with!

mobs.LongDesc: The Armorer is standing here ready to sell you his wonderful armors
mobs.DetailedDesc:
A short but powerful looking man stands before you.  He is wearing a suit
and looks like a person who is capable of selling anything.

mobs.LongDesc: Dan the Water Man is here waiting to sell you some quality water
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Dan the water man is a lazy looking guy who is wearing some loose fitting
jeans and a striped shirt.  He must be having a good day because he is
actually standing up.

mobs.LongDesc: Bubba, the owner of the Lagmart is standing here waiting for a sale
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This chubby owner of the Lagmart is wearing a white shirt and a solid blue
tie.  He waits patiently behind the counter for his next sale.

mobs.LongDesc: The Great Lagini appears out of thin air and points to the piece of paper
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a wise old man wearing dark blue robes and a pointed blue hat.  He
is a master magician and the best in all the land.  He knows just about
every spell in existance.

mobs.LongDesc: Tiger Paw-Friend of Animals is standing here waiting to sell you an animal
mobs.DetailedDesc:
She is a nice looking native american woman who is wearing a brightly colored
gown and has a long grey feather in her hair.  She is highly skilled with
animals and almost seems to be able to talk to them.

mobs.LongDesc: A man in a fancy uniform is here selling tickets
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a large man in a bright red uniform standing behind a small counter.
He has had a long day and is looks very tired.

mobs.LongDesc: A well trained Lag Beast stands here ready to assist you.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
A large hideous looking thing.  It is kind of like a horse, but much larger.
It has a nice leather saddle and is ready for you to ride it off to your
next adventure.

mobs.LongDesc: A large spam square is standing here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You have always wondered where spam came from.  Now you know.  This large
pink animal looks pleasant enough, but he can be mean if attacked.

mobs.LongDesc: A small spam square is wandering around in search of food.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This smaller version of a spam square is not as nice as it's larger counterpart,
but is to small to do any real damage.

mobs.LongDesc: A lag man is sta . . . walk . . . stand . . . walkin . . . standing here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a strong looking man with a blank expression on his face.  He appears
to be freezing every other second though.

mobs.LongDesc: A lag woman is wal . . . stan . . . walkin . . . standing here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a strong looking woman who has long blond hair.  She is tall and has
a wonderful smile.

mobs.LongDesc: A lag child is here looking for some trouble to get into.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
A small child with muddy cloths and a sinister expression on his face.  At
times the child can seem inocent, but you know better.

mobs.LongDesc: A golden knight stands here guarding the door.
A Lag Master stands here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This expert lag fighter is constantly preparing for his next battle with the
dreaded LAG!  Lag is not something to be taken lightly as it has killed the
best of players.  FEAR LAG!!!!!

mobs.LongDesc: The Grand Lag Master sits here at his desk.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a seasoned veteran of the lag wars sitting before you.  He has fought
long and hard to stop the forces of lag from advancing upon us.

mobs.LongDesc: A receptionist sits here talking on the phone.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a beautiful looking receptionist in a dark red dress.  She is talking
to her friends on the phone so it probably is not a good idea to bother her.

mobs.LongDesc: A server is running around trying to keep up with the hungry lag masters.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
She is a thin, but strong looking girl with dark brown hair.  She wears a
dark green dress with a white apron over it.

mobs.LongDesc: A viking stands here drinking and singing, "SPAM, SPAM, SPAM, SPAM, SPAM"
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a large looking viking with a horned helmet and a long beard.  He is
fairly strong looking and it seems as if he has not taken a bath in a long
time.

mobs.LongDesc: The waitress at the counter stands here and says, 'we got spam, spam, and cheeze, spam and spam, . . .
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see an older woman who is in charge of all of the other waitresses.
She has black hair which is slowly changing over to gray.  She makes sure
everything in the cafe runs smoothly.

mobs.LongDesc: A waitress is standing here taking orders.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a medium sized girl with long blond hair.  She looks like she is
overworked and underpaid.

mobs.LongDesc: A manager sits behind his behind his desk reading a newspaper.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a huge looking man in a blue suit sitting behind his desk.  He has
a large cup of coffee sitting on the desk along with a large pile of work
which he keeps putting off.

mobs.LongDesc: Big Al stands here trying to fix the toilet.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This former trumpet professor at a major conservatory became a janitor
when his students revolted last year.  He made them sing and tortured
them with his own singing.  He has brown hair and a beard.  FEAR Big Al
the janitor.

mobs.LongDesc: You walked in on a woman washing her hands.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a fairly large woman with a light blue dress on.  She seems VERY angry
that you walked in on her!

mobs.LongDesc: A security guard stands here waiting for his shift to end.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a large man in a blue uniform.  He looks like he could care less about
what is going on in the theater.  His shift is about over and he is getting
tired.

mobs.LongDesc: An usher is standing here ready to help people.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a boy in a red uniform with gold buttons.  He makes sure that people
get to where they need to go.

mobs.LongDesc: A Vendor stands here selling all sorts of food and drinks
mobs.DetailedDesc:
An older looking boy with a red and white striped shirt.  He sells everything
from popcorn to candy.

mobs.LongDesc: A projectionist is running around trying to get the movie started on time.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a woman wearing all black.  She is franticly throwing things
all over the place trying to find the film which should have already
started.

mobs.LongDesc: The Manager sits here working.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
A younger looking woman in a red business suit.  She is here running over
the numbers and making sure everything runs smoothly.

mobs.LongDesc: A large man sits here eating popcorn.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a large man in a yellow dress shirt and brown polyester pants.
He has a long beard and smells of old socks.

mobs.LongDesc: An elderly lady wandering around in search of her husband.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see an old woman with long grey hair.  She seems to be very nice, but has
become impatient with her husband.  He seems to have lost the tickets and
went off in search of them without her.

mobs.LongDesc: An Elderly man wanders around the theater in search of his tickets.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see an old man with a white shirt and blue sweater.  He is looking on the
floor trying to figure out what had happened to his tickets.

mobs.LongDesc: A kid is standing here playing video games.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
A pre-teen kid with nothing better to do with his life is here playing the
video games.  He is wearing a New York Yankees cap and a blue shirt.

mobs.LongDesc: A teenage guy stands here hanging out with his friends.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a teenager with dark black blue jeans and cool hair.  He stands
here waiting for a cute girl to walk by.

mobs.LongDesc: A teenage girl is standing here chatting with her friends.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a girl with SHORT shorts and a tight red shirt.  She has her phone
with her at all times and wears A LOT of make-up.

mobs.LongDesc: A newer version of space invaders sits here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a large machine with a small crowd of people standing in front of it.
As you look at it you can hear the bips and bleaps have always been asociated
with this game.

mobs.LongDesc: The origonal version of Centipede sits here surrounded by kids.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a large old looking machine being played just as much as when it
first came out.

mobs.LongDesc: A new and improved version of missile command sits here surrounded by kids.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a huge blue machine with people crowding all around it to watch the
action.  It has many of the ideas of the old missile command with updated
graphics and colors.

mobs.ShortDesc: a connection to a very lagged mud
mobs.LongDesc: There is a terminal set up here with a connection to a very lagged mud.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You notice that the children are mysteriously attracted to this slow running
game.  It is very popular here in The Land of Lag.

mobs.LongDesc: A blind man is walking around trying to figure out where he is.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a middle aged man with a long cane and dark glasses.  He appears to
be lost, but that may just be because of his blindness.

mobs.LongDesc: A policeman walks around making sure there is no trouble.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a large tall officer in a dark blue uniform.  He has a pair of dark
sunglasses and a silver badge.

mobs.LongDesc: The desk sergent sits here writing a report.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
A huge police officer with a dark blue uniform and sergent's stripes on
the left arm.  He looks fairly strong.

mobs.LongDesc: The chief of police sits at his desk drinking his coffe.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see before you the man in charge of keeping law and order in this
city.  He wears a dark blue uniform with gold bars on his shoulders
and cuffs.

mobs.LongDesc: An angry drunk stands here about to go off at any minute.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a fat, but tall man with a huge beer belly and covered in beer.
The smell of alcohol and the stench of the man make you sick.

mobs.LongDesc: A Thief sits here wondering how he was caught.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
A person dressed completely in black clothing.  He is a very sneaky
individual and can get himself out of situations easily.

mobs.LongDesc: The Mayor sits here trying to figure out a way to lower the taxes.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see an older looking man with a large build and red eyes.  The mayor
works hard to keep everything in the city running smoothly.

mobs.ShortDesc: a Member of the City Council
mobs.LongDesc: A member of the city council sits here talking to his friends.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
A fairly young man who is wearing a formal business suit.  He has trouble
paying attention because the sights outside the windows seem much more
interesting.

mobs.ShortDesc: the President of the City Council
mobs.LongDesc: The president of the city council sits here trying to get everyone's attention.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
She seems to be a very nice lady at times, but she can be impatient at
others.  She just wishes she could get this meeting started.

mobs.LongDesc: An Enormous Receptionist sits here taking down the lag people's complaints.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This massive receptionist is not one to be messed with.  She is one mean
looking lady and can scare a person out of the office with a single glance.

mobs.LongDesc: A large security guard stands here making sure there is no trouble.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a large muscular man in a dark blue uniform.  He has a gold badge
and a pair of dark sunglasses.

mobs.LongDesc: The post master is sitting here moving very slowly.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see an old man sitting in a wooden chair.  You decide that you should go
somewhere else to send your mail.

mobs.LongDesc: unused
unused
unused
